about: I am an experienced polyglot software engineer with a background in designing and building scalable system architectures. I have strong analytical skills and enjoy learning new frameworks and technologies. I am seeking an exciting new software development opportunity where I can make a meaningful and positive impact on the development team.

experience.title: Senior Consulting Engineer
mainDuties: Starting as a Consulting Engineer and progressing to Senior level in March 2019.
Working with customers across Europe from many different industries to design full stack systems from the ground up for best performance and scale.
Delivering both structured training courses and facilitating general transfer of knowledge during consulting engagements.
Learning new technologies quickly with a view to putting knowledge into practice quickly.
Performing root cause analysis for complex performance issues in distributed systems.
Providing technical leadership to customers during large migration and integration projects.
Assisting customers in diagnosing MongoDB performance issues across a range of programming languages such as C#, Go, Java, Javascript, Python and Ruby.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
mainDuties: Acting as server development lead for a operations tool for managing streaming analytical models.
Managing builds and wider dev-ops infrastructure for the team.
Providing feedback and input to Product Management and UI development teams.
Ported an initial prototype application from Scala to Java with the Akka framework
Championing use of source control, code reviews and dev-ops build methodologies within a growing team.
Primarily working with Java server-side and REST API components but providing support as an additional AngularJS resource as required.
Working and co-ordinating as part of a large, globally distributed team.
Designing microservice architecture and managing deployment strategy.

experience.title: Software Engineer
mainDuties: Starting as an intern, returning as a graduate and progressing to Software Engineer.
Working on development of a Java-based integration layer between a proprietary NoSQL database and an Oracle RDBMS for a large UK police force.
Providing on-site upgrade support and debugging for collaborative customer projects.
Providing development support to performance testing team including development of both Java and C# based performance testing frameworks.
Lead role in design of high availability architecture including evaluation of multiple cluster file systems and Oracle RAC.

languages.note: IELTS 8.5 / European Language Framework Level C2.
